summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account transactions for the period from May 1, 2016, to May 31, 2016. It includes information on debits, credits, and the ending balance of the account, along with instructions for addressing errors in transactions.

persons.name: Paul Niotis
persons.context: Paul Niotis is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

keyFacts: The account balance as of May 31, 2016, was $254,198.49.
The document lists multiple preauthorized debits for various payments including taxes and health premiums.
There were no overdraft fees or NSF return items reported for the statement period.
The document provides instructions for reporting errors in transactions within specified time frames.
